snippet: Twitter shares slumped at the expiration of a lockup period covering about 82 percent of its outstanding equity.
abstract: Stock market falls as investors find little to cheer in corporate earnings.
lead_paragraph: Twitter shares slumped at the expiration of a lockup period covering about 82 percent of its outstanding equity.

headline.main: Financial and Tech Stocks Weigh on Wall Street
headline.print_headline: Weak Earnings Reports Set Off a Broad Decline
